pluginstrument.author: David Chambers
pluginstrument.description:
This instrument was developed to interface the Knobster with the RealityXP FMS knob for Garmin GTN 650 and 750 for X-Plane. It directly sends appropriate RealityXP set of X-Plane commands. It can be configured for either Box 1 or Box 2 and is identical for both 650/750.
Create a panel containing only this instrument, setting the size and position of the panel to overlay only the FMS knob. All other buttons natively use the touchscreen interface via RealityXP plugin and so should not be overlaid by Air Manager.
